name: Five Nights at Tattletail 'n Bendy
description:
Five Nights at Tattletail 'n Bendy

It's the year 2017.The restaurant called "T&B Restaurant" had been closed, because children were killed.You're the night guard, you need to solve the mystery.

Tattletail belongs to Waygetter Electronics

Bendy belongs to Joey Drew Studios Inc.

FNaF belongs to Scott Cawthon
